definitions.definition: a conversation about somebody/something; the process of discussing somebody/something
definitions.sensetop: discussion with somebody (about somebody/something)discussion about somebody/somethingdiscussion on somethingdiscussion around somethingdiscussion of somethingdiscussion among/between A and B (about somebody/something)under discussionfor discussion

wordOrigin: Middle English (denoting judicial examination): via Old French from late Latin discussio(n-), from discutere ‘investigate’, from dis- ‘apart’ + quatere ‘shake’.
